Ingredients: 1 sachet instant green coffee powder, 2-3 lemon wedges, 1 tsp chia seeds, half inch ginger, 2-3 mint leaves, 1 liter water.
Empty the contents of a green coffee sachet in a glass pitche… [+196 chars]
